author: TravisEz13
body:
FYI, @DarwinJS 
I'm using the CentOS 7.3 image on azure.

Steps to reproduce
------------------

```sh
# Install PowerShell

curl -o install-powershell.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/master/tools/install-powershell.sh
if [[ $? -ne 0 ]] ; then
    exit 1
fi

chmod +x ./install-powershell.sh
if [[ $? -ne 0 ]] ; then
    exit 1
fi

./install-powershell.sh
if [[ $? -ne 0 ]] ; then
    exit 1
fi
```

correctly install powershell
